dct_title_s: Map of the routes in India: with tables of distances between the principal military towns & military stations
dct_description_sm: Scale approximately 1:5,000,000 ; Relief shown by hachures. Shows railways and telegraph cables. "Engraved by the Omnigraph, F. P. Becker & Co." Includes distance tables: Distances in the Madras Presidency -- Distances in the Bombay Presidency -- Distances in Bengal & Agra. 65 x 77 cm
dcat_keyword_sm: Post Office Stations and Branches India Maps
